messages.title: Standing Up For You
messages.content: Vote Rosie Duffield, Labour candidate for Canterbury.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting a Fair and Transparent Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As your MP, I will ensure the rights of workers, students, and businesses are protected.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cleaning Up the Tory Housing Shambles
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will end insecurity for private renters and kick start the biggest house building program.
Labour will create an economy that works for all, invest in green technology and ensure fair pay and working conditions.
Labour will ensure sustainable funding for our NHS and health services.

mentions.candidate: Labour candidate for Canterbury, Rosie Duffield

community.content: Labour will end insecurity for private renters.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a single mum and lifelong campaigner, I am standing to be your Labour MP for Canterbury and Whitstable.
